|802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.11.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = |defaultssid = XXXXXXXXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Quanta Microsystems |manuf_model = BR102 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt, Tomato |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 03/26/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00BHLU1K0 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 13 |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== A C2PC made 04/12/2007 adds a heatsink, changes the power adapter, and changes the WAN port color from black to blue. "790BR102201Q" is silkscreened on the board of one G125 (w/ heatsink + blue WAN port). This '''Quanta''' P/N would seem to indicate this board designation is '''BR102'''. :The single radial capacitor on this G125's board is from '''TAICON'''. The default SSID is the MAC address printed on the label on the bottom of the unit (with upper case letters).. an example of such would be '''0016019ACBA0'''. ==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/whr-g125 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = v23 SP2 :initial flash: use [[TechInfoDepot:DD-WRT/TFTP flash|Tftp flash]] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/buffalo/buffalo_whr-g125 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/whr-g125 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 8.09 |current_supported_version = 10.03.1 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing Tomato=== Please insert instructions here ==Notes== ===wl revinfo===
